semantic_description: RabbitMQ message publish/consume path where no spans are currently emitted, causing the operation to be invisible in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the exchange name variable in scope (e.g., 'exchangeName')

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'routingKey' variable used when publishing or binding

attributes_to_add.name: net.peer.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the RabbitMQ connection endpoint host name

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' for producer spans and 'receive' for consumer spans
